message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its potential, I'm offering it at $13,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.
Thanks for your feedback, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.
Bob, I appreciate your negotiation style, but my price floor for this product is $11,500. This is my final offer, as I believe it's a fair reflection of the value you'll gain.
I appreciate your final offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.
